segments.text: Hi there , I'm Steve Saunders.What ' s your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Patti Whitney.Isn ' t this convention great ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes it is , better than I expected it would be.The presenters have been first rate.Is this the first conference you've been to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I've been coming for the last 3 years.Each year keeps getting better.Where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm from Long Island , New York.What about yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm from the other side of the coast--Los Angeles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . I really like California ... the weather there is much better than the East Coast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just once.Quite a few years ago we took the kids to Disneyland on our vacation.They had a blast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many kids do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two , a boy and a girl.They ’ re already grown now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , California ’ s changed over the last little while.You should come back out sometime .
segments.speaker: S2
